DOC.brief_summary: The Nit-Occlud PDA Post-Approval Study design continue evaluate safety effectiveness device post-approval phase .
DOC.criteria: Angiographically confirm PDA minimum diameter < 4 mm . Weight ≥ 5 kg . Age 6 month 21 year . Cardiac anomalies require surgery . Known bleed coagulation disorder . Febrile illness within 7 day plan procedure . Pregnancy . Pulmonary hypertension increase pulmonary vascular resistance ( ≥ 5 Wood Units ) . Hypersensitivity contrast medium . Known nickel allergy .
